name: blackboard-native-pdf-viewer
description: Browser extension that reveals Blackboard file link allowing preview in the native PDF viewer in a new tab. For non-PDF files, the file is downloaded. Currently only for Firefox.
author: Tarik Kirgin

scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R common/* dist/ && cp manifest_v3/manifest.json dist/
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R common/* dist/ && cp manifest_v2/manifest.json dist/
